00018             enum DeserializationStatus
00019             {
00021                 DESERIALIZATION_COMPLETE = 0x00,
00026                 DESERIALIZATION_UNKNOWN_OBJECT_ID = 0x01,
00031                 DESERIALIZATION_UNKNOWN_CODEC_ID = 0x02,
00037                 DESERIALIZATION_INSUFFICIENT_DATA = 0x04,
00042                 DESERIALIZATION_INVALID_DATA =  0x08,
00047                 DESERIALIZATION_MISSING_OBJECTS = 0x10,
00052                 DESERIALIZATION_CORRUPT_OBJECTS = 0x20,
00054                 DESERIALIZATION_PARTIAL_MASK = DESERIALIZATION_UNKNOWN_OBJECT_ID | DESERIALIZATION_UNKNOWN_CODEC_ID | DESERIALIZATION_MISSING_OBJECTS | DESERIALIZATION_CORRUPT_OBJECTS,
00056                 DESERIALIZATION_ERROR_MASK = DESERIALIZATION_INSUFFICIENT_DATA | DESERIALIZATION_INVALID_DATA,
00057             };
00058             typedef uint32 DeserializationStatusFlags;

00402             // Utility routines for child classes to read and write different data types in
00403             // network byte order.
00404     
00406 
00409             static void appendRawBytes(std::vector<uint8>& dest, const char*src_bytes, unsigned int size)
00410             {
00411                 dest.insert(dest.end(), src_bytes, src_bytes + size);
00412             }
00413     
00414             // Note that the ordering of these functions in the header file is important!
00415             static void appendBuffer(std::vector<uint8>& buffer, const std::string& value);
00416             
00417             template <typename ValueType>
00418             static void appendBuffer(std::vector<uint8>& buffer, ValueType value)
00419             {
00420                 COREDATA_STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(value) == 1 || sizeof(value) == 2
00421                     || sizeof(value) == 4 || sizeof(value) == 8);
00422                 appendNBytes(buffer, reinterpret_cast<char *>(&value), sizeof(value));
00423             }
00424             
00425             static void appendBuffer(std::vector<uint8>& buffer, bool value);
00426     
00428             template <typename ArrayType>
00429             static void appendBuffer(std::vector<uint8>& buffer, const ArrayType *array, int num_elements)
00430             {
00431                 for (int i=0; i < num_elements; i++)
00432                 {
00433                     appendBuffer(buffer, array[i]);
00434                 }
00435             }
00436     
00437             template <typename ValueType>
00438             static void readBuffer(const std::vector<uint8>& buffer, int& read_pos_inout, ValueType& value)
00439             {
00440                 COREDATA_STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(value) == 1 || sizeof(value) == 2
00441                     || sizeof(value) == 4 || sizeof(value) == 8);
00442                 readNBytes(buffer, read_pos_inout, reinterpret_cast<char *>(&value), sizeof(value));
00443             }
00444             static void readBuffer(const std::vector<uint8>& buffer, int& read_pos_inout, bool& value);
00445             static void readBuffer(const std::vector<uint8>& buffer, int& read_pos_inout, std::string& value);
00446     
00448             template <typename ArrayType>
00449             static void readBuffer(const std::vector<uint8>& buffer, int& read_pos_inout, ArrayType *array, int num_elements)
00450             {
00451                 for (int i=0; i < num_elements; i++)
00452                 {
00453                     readBuffer(buffer, read_pos_inout, array[i]);
00454                 }
00455             }
00456     
00458 
00470             static void readRawBytes(const std::vector<uint8>& buffer, int& read_pos_inout, uint8* array, size_t num_elements);
